寱字的基本解释

寱
yì
古同“呓”，梦话。
惊。

寱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《集韻》倪祭切，去祭，疑。］
同“囈1”。
梦中说话。

寱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寱； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页292第24
【廣韻】魚際切【集韻】研計切，?音藝。【說文】瞑言也。【徐鉉曰】今人謂夢中有言爲寱語。【莊子·天運篇】不得㝱，必且寱焉。唐元結有寱論，譏諫官不言事，見【文粹】。　又【唐韻】牛例切【集韻】倪祭切【正韻】倪制切，?音聣。義同。　【廣韻】亦作㦣囈。

寱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
寱字的起名意思

暂无。

寱
yì
Gu Tong "chatters" and talks in sleep.
shock.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Jiyun" Ni Jiqie, go to sacrifice, doubt. ]
Same as "呓1".
Talking in dreams.
寱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[1st Yin Ji] [Liu Zi Department] 　寱; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 292 24
[Guangyun] Yuji cut [Jiyun] Research and cut,? Sound art. 【Speaking text】Liuyan also. [Xu Xuan said] Today people say that words in dreams are babbles. [Zhuangzi·Tianyun Chapter] Don’t 㝱, you have to go to 寱焉. Tang Yuanjie has a slanderous theory, ridiculing officials without saying anything, see 【Wen Cui】.　 [Tang Yun] Niu Juqie [Jiyun] Ni Jiqie [Zheng Yun] Ni Zhiqie,? Yin Yu. The same meaning.　【Guangyun】also made 㦣呓.
